channel.title: Internal Objects?
channel.description:
I couldn't think of an appropriate title for this, but let me explain my situation.
You know on the minimap if there is a wall it will just be like a white line on the minimap representing it, I want to add my own.
I'm making my own home area with a map editor, I got the bank area built in nice and neat, the hight settings are perfect, etc. I don't want to load objects for my walls, I want it to load.. how can i put it.. within the server. In other words.. I want this: [img]http://img831.imageshack.us/img831/2169/96717898.png[/img] To look like this: [img]http://img685.imageshack.us/img685/6126/50650505.png[/img] but not only that, have an actual like.. wall there that isn't an object so when u right click on it, it will act like it's just a part of the map.
I realized that these objects aren't added in via the map editor.. How can I add them?

item.title: Internal Objects?
item.dc:creator: @runeite51 runeite51
item.description:
@runeite51 wrote:

I Vain I:

Pack them inside the cache.

Could you please link me to a tutorial that tells me how to put it in the cache? I’d really appreciate it, thx.

Read full topic

item.title: Internal Objects?
item.dc:creator: @runeite51 runeite51
item.description:
@runeite51 wrote:

I see, but does it create that white line representing a wall on the minimap?

Read full topic

item.title: Internal Objects?
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

There are objects that you can add in that have no right clicks. Just either use existing walls or go download my server Zombiescape and inside the client in class 46 I think is the object one I have annotated what most of the variables do for objects. Then just set the object you want to use so that it has no right clicks. Simple

Read full topic
